comment:
Distance: 1202 Conditions: Stake boats. Head wind for 1v’s and 2v. When rain started no wind my moderate rain for Novices Comments: Girls novice event Middletown caught a crab off the start. Then at the dock Avon had an oar come out of the oar lock and then caught a crab. Took them about 30” to correct and keep racking. Thank you Avon and Middletown for coming to the Middle of the Farmington

None
regatta_display_name: NEIRA Boys & Girls Eights,Middle of Farmington: Farmington, Avon, Middletown
